title: Paranoid schizophrenic
creator_contributor_role: National Association of Mental Health, production company

description: The case history of a paranoid- schizophrenic, who believes that doctors, patients and the whole world are united in plotting his destruction. Dr Henry Dubost discusses the patient's symptoms, treatment, and rehabilitation to his former job.
